channel.title: Fifty Shades of Grey on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Fifty Shades of Grey on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Gus Van Sant on Returning to Film Directing With ‘Dead Man’s Wire’ and the Steamy Audition Tape That Cost Him ‘Fifty Shades of Grey’
item.description: Gus Van Sant has a thing for outsiders. From “Drugstore Cowboy” to “My Own Private Idaho” to “Good Will Hunting” (still the biggest hit of his career), Van Sant likes to turn his camera on the hookers
